name: quaveringly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
with a voice that is shaking because of strong emotion: "Are you the owner?" said the man. "I am," I replied quaveringly. "Lucenzo!" she called quaveringly, "Where are you?"
More examplesFewer examplesA woman's voice called quaveringly from the hall: "Madame, can you hear me?""I can't believe how horrible it is that we're speaking like this to each other," she told him quaveringly.His voice was quaveringly emphatic as he told us about the strange events of the previous evening.
